title: Fairy Tail, Vol. 48
description: TWO DRAGONS, THREE SLAYERSWith her curse magic, Kyoka has deprived Erza of all her sensesâ€”exceptpain, which she has amplified into excruciating torture! But even in thesehopeless circumstances, the Fairy Queen continues to counterattack!Meanwhile, the duels between Igneel and Acnologia and between Natsuand the Underworld King rage on, as dragon father and wizard son struggleto grab onto a sliver of hope! The twin dragons of Sabertooth, Rogueand Sting, show up to help. Can the joint efforts of three dragon slayersforce Mard Geer to get serious? The critical moment arrives in the battlebetween fairies and demons!
author: Hiro Mashima
